column1: Hence, considering all the circumstances of this case, I set aside the sentence
imposed on the Appellant and substitute with a term of 10 years rigorous
imprisonment. A fine of Rs.10000/-  with 06 months default sentence also
imposed on the Appellant. Payment of compensation with default sentence
As the Appellant is in prison since the date of conviction by the Learned High
Court Judge, I order the sentence imposed by this Court be operative from
Subject to the above variation the appeal is dismissed.
The  Registrar  of  this  Court  is  directed  to  send  this  judgment  to  the  High
Court of Trincomalee along with the original case record.
